name: to-do-list-mvc-graphql
description: todo-graphql-app/ │ ├── src/ │   ├── config/              # Configuration files (e.g. DB) │   ├── models/              # Mongoose models │   ├── resolvers/           # GraphQL resolvers (Controller logic) │   ├── schemas/             # GraphQL schemas │   ├── services/            # Business logic (optional abstraction) │   ├── routes/              # GraphQL endpoint setup │   └── app.js               # Main app setup │ ├── tests/                  # Unit & integration tests │ ├── .env ├── .gitignore ├── package.json └── server.js               # Entry point
